description:
Commute through the week, explore on the weekends. A versatile bike designed with the gravel curious in mind, the Topstone 3 is equally at home on bike lanes or logging roads. Plush 37C tires and a carbon fork help minimize vibrations before they get to you. And if you are serious about gravel riding, you’ll be happy to know that this stable bike is dropper post ready. There are even plenty of mounting points for the bikepackers among us.

  • SmartForm C2 alloy frame and BallisTec Full Carbon fork, with efficient gravel bike geometry
  • Frame is compatible with an internally routed 27.2 dropper post (sold separately)
  • Removable fender bridge provides mounting options
  • 2x9 drive train pairs a 46/30T chain ring with an 11-348T cassette, providing lots of mechanical advantage
  • Shimano Sora components with an alloy FSA Tempo crank set
  • ProMax Decoder R mechanical disc brakes keep velocity under control
  • WTB Riddler Comp tires in a plush 37C offer great grip
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Topstone 3 Bicycle - Unisex
